column1: Local Foods////1. Garden Sammie (with Pretzel Bun): The Garden Sammie is an incredibly flavorful vegan option that even meat-eaters will love. It has curried cauliflower
column4: and marinated onions that give it a lovely tang. While the ciabatta is tasty
column5: the pretzel bun is truly the star of the show when it comes to bread options at Local Foods. I get this sandwich consistently
